events.title: PA Accelerator & web3 Chat
events.description: Round 1 of accelerator submissions is closing & we want to discuss the process + people's Web3 passions. What gaps in Web3 need more attention? Let's hear from our small business owners & creatives!

events.title: Women Led Wednesday
events.description: Come join us on Wednesdays, where PA Women run the show.

events.title: Theory Thursday
events.description: Don't let the lore befuddle you. You're not alone on Thursday when we discuss the latest theory.

events.title: Ric Flair Friday
events.description: Hear Junior Whooo! Play some 'rock, paper, scissors' and have fun having other PA related discussions.

events.title: Secure the Bag Saturdays
events.description: Something is happening... you'll probably wan't to hear about it... and it's happening here.

events.title: Easy like a Sunday Manno
events.description: Take it easy with Sunday Manno from 12pm est to 2pm est assuming he doesn't sleep in like a sleepy Manno.

events.title: Mindfulness Monday
events.description: Mindfulness practice, meet new fam, and celebrating together. Come join us in this recorded spaces.
